name: Sculpt Clay
description:
Feel the clay between your fingers, in Sculpt Clay!

Spin the pottery wheel to begin shaping your clay. Slowly shape and mould your latest creation, in order to make stunning pottery. Once the base of your creation is complete, use the stamps and other tools to decorate your latest make!

Become a Master Potter today!

Sculpt Clay features:
-Make pottery
-Play with clay
-Design art
